item.title: Adversarial Attacks on RL Agents
item.author: nikhilweee@gmail.com (Nikhil Verma)
item.description: This post a write up for the final project as part of NYU’s graduate course on Deep Reinforcement Learning. The project was the result of a collaboration with Advika Reddy. Table of Contents Abstract Background What are Adversarial Attacks? How are they different for RL Agents? Types of Adversarial Attacks White-box Attacks Black-box Attacks Motivation How do the adversarial policies exploit the victim?
